titleStmt.title: The hellish Parliament being a counter-Parliament to this in England, containing the demonstrative speeches and statutes of that court together with the perfect league made between the two hellish factions the papists and the Brownists.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Taylor. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
